General.Name: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity and steam in Thailand. It operates a cogeneration power plant with a capacity to produce approximately 215 megawatts of electricity and 96 tons of steam per hour. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
